thread.title: Beyoncé's pregnancy photo destroyed Instagram record because of course it did
thread.title_full: Beyoncé's pregnancy photo destroyed Instagram record because of course it did

author: Stan Schroeder
title: Beyoncé's pregnancy photo destroyed Instagram record because of course it did
text:
Sorry, Selena Gomez , you no longer have the most-liked photo on Instagram. 
That honor now belongs to (who other than) Beyoncé, whose pregnancy announcement photo has more than 7,400,000 likes at the time of this writing. 
SEE ALSO: Beyoncé's big announcement gave an incredible start to Black History Month 
The photo, which has been online for just over half a day, also has more than 360,000 comments.
We would like to share our love and happiness. We have been blessed two times over. We are incredibly grateful that our family will be growing by two, and we thank you for your well wishes. - The Carters 
A photo posted by Beyoncé (@beyonce) on Feb 1, 2017 at 10:39am PST 
Besides congratulatory messages and likes, Beyoncé was also treated to an uncanny amount of memes and jokes yesterday. Selena Gomez, who utterly dominated Instagram last year, will have to try hard to beat this one. 
BONUS: Beyoncé's VMA performance confirms she's still your queen
